section.title: Block Struct Reference

para.para: This is the actual "Block" that will store the key and value pair. This block will be dynamically allocated and deallocated during "set" and "delete" operations in blinkdb.

listitem.para: Tells if the block is used or not.
The key in the key-value pair.
The value in the key-value pair.

section.section:
Detailed Description
This is the actual "Block" that will store the key and value pair. This block will be dynamically allocated and deallocated during "set" and "delete" operations in blinkdb.
The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file: block.h
